ValidationRule.description: Job stage in Won stage can only be changed to Work Complete stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Stage__c ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Stage__c ) , "Won"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Work Complete")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Lost")), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Won stage can only be changed to Work Complete. Please chatter @Nat Lee if you need assistance updating the stage.
